javadoc: allows items to add custom lines of information to the mouseover description

methods.name: a
javadoc: Called to trigger the item's "innate" right click behavior. To handle when this item is used on a Block, see {@link #onItemUse}.

methods.name: j
javadoc: Returns the unlocalized name of this item. This version accepts an ItemStack so different stacks can have different names based on their damage or NBT.
